allow: Bash(cmd /c "del D:\DOAPP\INSTRUCCIONES.md & del D:\DOAPP\PAYPAL_SETUP.md & del D:\DOAPP\PAYPAL_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md & del D:\DOAPP\PHASE2.1_COMPLETE.md & echo Files deleted successfully")

Bash(powershell -Command "if (Test-Path INSTRUCCIONES.md) { Remove-Item INSTRUCCIONES.md -Force }; if (Test-Path PAYPAL_SETUP.md) { Remove-Item PAYPAL_SETUP.md -Force }; if (Test-Path PAYPAL_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md) { Remove-Item PAYPAL_INTEGRATION_SUMMARY.md -Force }; Write-Host ''Redundant files removed''")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Resolve deployment errors and make OAuth optional

- Modified security check to make OAuth credentials optional (only required: MongoDB, JWT, PayPal)
- Fixed TypeScript errors in upload.ts (Express Request types)
- Fixed TypeScript errors in paypal.ts (added @ts-ignore for incomplete SDK types)
- Added RAILWAY_SETUP.md with comprehensive deployment guide

OAuth providers (Google, Facebook) now show warnings instead of blocking deployment.
